reviews.text: Stopped on the off-chance as I was running behind schedule. Lovely little town, and although the motel is showing its age - some of the fixtures are distinctly elderly - it is obviously well cared for.
reviews.title: Charming motel in a quaint town

reviews.text: The wifi had failed in one block so Sue kindly upgraded me without charge to the other block where I was able to use my laptop without problems. The room was very clean, and vast - over 20' x 15' - with 2 kings, work desk, big TV, nice coffee. Bathtub showing its age, but very clean, works well, and the bathroom floor appeared brand new. Relatively quiet location as it is down a side road, with the picturesque cemetery just beyond.
reviews.title: Love Hermann Motel

reviews.text: Went for supper at Lyndees, a mom and pop diner round the corner and was very well looked after. Breakfast neatly laid out in the ice/vending room in centre of motel, and there's plenty of choice, including 4 different juices, and fresh fruit.
reviews.title: Decent Value
